capService.enterCapPathChoiceName: Manually select CAP service folder path

ignoreCertErrors.message: Do you want to continue generation with the untrusted certificate?

validationMessages.odataVersionMismatch: The template you have chosen supports V{{requiredOdataVersion}} OData services only. The provided version is V{{providedOdataVersion}}.
validationMessages.metadataFilePathNotValid: The metadata file does not exist or is not accessible. Please specify a valid file path.
validationMessages.capProjectNotFound: The folder you have selected does not contain a valid CAP project. Please check and try again.
validationMessages.warningCertificateValidationDisabled: Certificate validation has been disabled by the user.
validationMessages.annotationsNotFound: Annotations not found for the specified service.

warnings.nonUIServiceTypeWarningMessage: Services of service type: {{serviceType}} or without a service type are not intended to be used for generating SAP Fiori UI applications.
warnings.noServicesAvailable: There are no services available for the selected system. For more information, see the logs.
warnings.noServicesAvailableForOdataVersion: There are no OData V{{odataVersion}} services available from the selected system and the template you have chosen only supports OData V{{odataVersion}} services.
warnings.noAnnotations: No back-end annotations associated with this service were retrieved. This can result in an invalid application.
warnings.collaborativeDraftMessage: The selected service is draft-enabled but does not support collaborative draft.

systemUrl.description: Enter the URL of the SAP System

systemService.noServicesWarning: No services available for the selected system. For more information, see the logs.

newSystemType.choiceAbapOnBtp: ABAP Environment on SAP Business Technology Platform
newSystemType.choiceCFAbapEnvServiceOnBtp: Cloud Foundry ABAP environment on SAP Business Technology Platform
newSystemType.notYetImplementedWarningMessage: The selected system type: {{ systemType }} is not yet implemented.

systemName.hint: Entering a system name will save the connection for re-use.
systemName.systemNameExistsWarning: A system with that name already exists in the secure storage. Please try a different name.
systemName.reservedSystemNameWarning: '{{ systemName }}' is a reserved system name. Please try a different name.

systemSelection.authenticationFailedUpdateCredentials: Authentication failed. Please try updating the credentials.

serviceKey.hint: Select a local file that defines the service connection for an ABAP Environment on SAP Business Technology Platform.
serviceKey.incompleteServiceKeyInfo: The service keys file does not contain the required information. Check the file is valid and try again.
serviceKey.unparseableServiceKey: The service keys file does not contain a valid JSON format. Check the formatting and try again.

cloudFoundryAbapSystem.hint: Enter the name of the Cloud Foundry service that contains the ABAP Environment instance.

destinationServicePath.hint: Enter the path to the OData service relative to the selected destination URL.
destinationServicePath.invalidServicePathWarning: Please enter a valid service path

mainEntitySelection.defaultEntityNameNotFoundWarning: The supplied entity cannot be found in the service. Please choose from the list above.
mainEntitySelection.noDraftEnabledEntitiesError: The CAP service you have chosen does not have any entities that are draft enabled. To generate a V4 Fiori application using this floor plan for a CAP project, the entity selected must be draft enabled.
mainEntitySelection.noEntitiesAlpV4Error: The OData V4 service you have provided is not suitable for use in an analytical list page application. The service must contain aggregate based entities for this template.

tableType.hint: Defines the table type for the list report page.

hierarchyQualifier.hint: Leading property that decides between either a recursive hierarchy or data aggregation.
hierarchyQualifier.qualifierRequiredForV4Warning: Hierarchy qualifier is required for OData V4 services.

addFEOPAnnotations.message: Automatically add a form to the generated application if none already exists?

addLineItemAnnotations.message: Automatically add table columns to the list page and a section to the object page if none already exists?
addLineItemAnnotations.valueHelpsAnnotationsInfoMessage: Basic value helps will also be created.

presentationQualifier.hint: Represents the qualifier of the `SelectionPresentationVariant`. The analytical list page looks for a `SelectionPresentationVariant` with this qualifier and if not found, it looks for a `PresentationVariant` with this qualifier.

tableSelectionMode.hint: Defines different selection modes for the `SmartTable` in the analytical list page.

tableMultiSelect.hint: Allows you to show a checkbox for selecting multiple items in a table. This setting comes into effect only if there are actions defined either by using an annotation or a setting in the `manifest.json` file.

tableAutoHide.hint: Determines chart or table interaction. If set to `true`, the chart acts as a filter for the table. If set to `false`, the matching table rows are highlighted but the table is not filtered.

destination.authError: The selected system: {{systemName}} returned an authentication error: {{- error}}.
destination.listDestinations: An error occurred when retrieving the list of destinations: {{- error}}.

errors.cannotReadCapServiceMetadata: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. $t(texts.seeLogForDetails).
errors.capModelAndServicesLoadError: An error occurred loading the CAP model and services: {{- error, addMsgWithColonFormatter}}.
errors.capServiceUrlPathNotDefined: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. The CAP service property: `urlPath` is not defined but it is required.
errors.connectionError: A connection error occurred. Ensure the target host is available on the network: {{- error}}
errors.noServicesAvailable: There are no OData V{{version}} services available from the selected system and the template you have chosen only supports OData V{{version}} services.
errors.systemOrServiceUrlNotFound: Please verify the URL: {{- url}}, target system configuration and network connectivity.
errors.certValidationRequired: Certificate validation is required to continue.
errors.serviceMetadataError: An error occurred reading service metadata for service: {{- servicePath}}.
errors.serviceTypeRequestError: An error occurred when retrieving the service type: {{- error}}.
errors.abapServiceAuthenticationFailed: ABAP environment authentication using UAA failed.
errors.serviceCatalogRequest: An error occurred requesting services from: {{- catalogRequestUri }} and entity set: {{entitySet}}: {{error}}.
errors.storedSystemConnectionError: An error occurred when validating the stored system connection info. System Name: {{-systemName}}. Error: {{- error}}.
errors.noCatalogOrServiceAvailable: No active system or OData service endpoint connection available to retrieve the server.
errors.allCatalogServiceRequestsFailed: All catalog service requests failed for the selected system. OData version: V{{version}}.
errors.unparseableMetadata: Unable to parse entities from the metadata document: {{-error}}.
errors.unparseableOdataVersion: Unable to parse the OData version from the metadata.
errors.noRelevantEntities: The template and service selected have no relevant entities that you can use.
errors.cfInstanceCredentialsNotReturned: Cannot not retrieve credentials to access: {{serviceInstanceName}}.
errors.v2CatalogServiceNoAnnotations: An error occurred when creating an OData V2 catalog service object. Annotations will not be available: {{-error}}

warnings.largeMetadataDocument: The metadata for this OData service is very large. It may take some time before this operation completes.

texts.seeLogForDetails: For more information, view the logs.
texts.checkDestinationAuthConfig: Please check the SAP BTP destination authentication configuration.
